text: On account of Road Safety Week, police intensified vehicle checking at night across the three sub divisions of Kanyakumari, Thuckalay and Colachal and 262 cases of drunken driving were booked — one-fourth from Aralvoimozhi. Police sources said that 500 persons were booked for riding vehicles without driving licence, RC book and insurance papers.
title: 262 cases of drunk driving booked
